articles.description: Central Coroner confirms ‘extensive and more specialised testing’ was conducted on Nathan Turner following his tragic death
articles.content:
EXTENSIVE post mortem testing has ruled out COVID-19 as the cause of death for Blackwater man Nathan Turner as an autopsy revealed he had significant health issues.
Central Coroner David OConnell to… [+1932 chars]
